channel.title: Question
channel.description: okay,this morning i was talking to my friend, which i am a mod on his server..and he wasn't respawnding, and it said "peer is no longer on your contact list".what does this mean? :confused:

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @khaled khaled
item.description:
@khaled wrote:

hello one question i dont understand how do get items u see they said to i must write the id do i do so ::item 3140 ???
and please tell me

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

It means that the contact list has not been added to his server because he has a different source i do believe. Try typing ::tell >name of friend< >message< then enter. It should work, if not try typing ::yell >message< and enter. If that does not work then try to find him… [br][size=1]Posted at: July 31, 2006, 02:15:21 PM[/size][hr]Did it work or what? =S

Read full topic
